channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat Data Grid 8.4.6
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat Data Grid 8.4.6

item.title: CVE-2023-4586|2024-08-19T12:18:13.555Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20data%20grid%208.4.6
item.description: A vulnerability was found in the Hot Rod client. This security issue occurs as the Hot Rod client does not enable hostname validation when using TLS, possibly resulting in a man-in-the-middle (MITM) attack.
